code: import React from"react";import{Navbar,Container,Nav,Button}from"react-bootstrap";import"./Header.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{toggleTheme,theme}=_ref;const isDark=theme==="dark";return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{expand:"lg",fixed:"top",className:`navbar-custom ${isDark?"bg-dark":"bg-light"}`,variant:isDark?"dark":"light",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{fluid:"md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Brand,{href:"#",className:"navbar-brand-custom",children:"Apichet"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Toggle,{"aria-controls":"navbar-nav"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Collapse,{id:"navbar-nav",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"ms-auto align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"#about",className:"nav-link-custom",children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"#projects",className:"nav-link-custom",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{href:"#contact",className:"nav-link-custom",children:"Contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:toggleTheme,variant:isDark?"outline-light":"outline-dark",size:"sm",className:"ms-3 theme-toggle-btn",title:`Switch to ${isDark?"Light":"Dark"} Mode`,children:isDark?"‚òÄÔ∏è Light":"üåô Dark"})]})})]})});};export default Header;
